website_summaries.verdict: The Oster Beehive is a subpar blender, both lagging behind other budget models and falling short of its classic namesake.
pros: The Oster Beehive has a classic look
It doesn't leak, and can do the basics if you give it a push
cons: This was the worst performer of the blenders we've tested
The squared-off jar keeps it from cycling through foods on its own, meaning you'll need to stir frequently

customer_reviews.title: Simple, powerful, mason threads
customer_reviews.text: The blender seems pretty solid and powerful for the price. The blade fits small mouth mason jars for those of you making individual drinks as we do. The blade design also converts ice cubes into tiny slush pellets pretty fast without slamming the cubes against the glass.I'll update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: tahotoy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blender!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender some months ago and still works great as new. I have always use this brand and type of blender because it has always worked great, nothing to envy a Ninja blender....HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Lp

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless steel it’s pure plastic
customer_reviews.text: Not as picture in picture it shows brushed stainless steel but what you get is not it’s plastic
customer_reviews.author: AZGuy86

customer_reviews.title: Oster 2 speed blender powerful with a classic look
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender. It only has 2 speeds but that's really all I need. It blends really well and makes good smoothies. You can even attach a ball canning glass if you want to make a personal smoothie. It's easy to clean and doesn't take up a lot of space on the counter. It has a nice brushed stainless steel look so no visible fingerprints PRO: Powerful at a great price CON: Crushes ice only one way - like a slushy
customer_reviews.author: Cvd13

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is really loud but does the job really fast. I use it on Icey shakes and I've been happy with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for sauces and smoothies! It crushes ice well for summer drinks too. I've even used it to puree steamed veggies and sneak them into my son's food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is one that looks the same as my older one but when running smells like burnt plastic
customer_reviews.text: I had a older one and it ran solid. This is one that looks the same as my older one but when running smells like burnt plastic. Poorly made internals but looks same as the older version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great blender. Thank you for its simplicity and power ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blender. Thank you for its simplicity and power to make smoothies or puree soups. love it.
customer_reviews.author: atrebor

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Ninja at a department store after doing some research on blenders but didn't like it at all. Unfortunately I had already thrown out my old blender which was better then the Ninja. I then ordered the Oster and I have to say, despite the very basic functions and design, this machine works really well. It's a bit noisy (it's a BLENDER after all) but my smoothies come out...well - smooth! Much better than the more expensive one. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Glasper

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: It blends well and is easy to clean. Good deal for the money! Downside... it is REALLY loud
customer_reviews.author: BookCrone

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that this blender would be so powerful. It literally pulverizes all that I put into it. Very powerful motor. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Denmark

customer_reviews.title: way way way tooo loud.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product. This blender looks great, but it is way way way too loud. Now I live in a house with 3 kids, a dog, and always have my radio blasting in the back ground so I'm used to noise, but this blender makes me jump every time I tried to blend something. I thought I'd get used to it, but thought to myself, that I shouldn't have to get used to such noise so I returned it after 3 days. I got a kitchen-aid blender for about $20 more and it's amazing the difference. No need to suffer folks, pass on this one, unless of course you really don't mind the noise. lol
customer_reviews.author: Simret

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, as effective as 500$ blenders I've used. Very easy to use, easy to clean. The metal bottom is louder than the plastic one, which seems to muffle the sound, but has a less sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Durham

customer_reviews.title: Makes my mornings so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is amazingly powerful, it handles everything beautifully. Ice, kale, frozen fruit...everything is blended quickly and smoothly. As for the noise... blenders are loud! I don't find it to be any worse than any other I have had. Here's a tip... get a few regular-mouth mason jars and you can turn it into a personal smoothie maker!
customer_reviews.author: That Girl

product_meta.title: Oster 004242-600-000 004242-600-NP0 Power Blender, 40 Ounce, Black
product_meta.description: Oster’s Beehive Blender takes you back in time with its retro design and reliable performance. The blender is built with an all metal drive system and powerful 600-Watt motor to crush ice for the smoothest smoothies, creamiest milkshakes and more. The stainless steel blade chops and purees with precision for prepping recipes and preparing foods like salsa, dips and soups. The blender comes with a 6-cup dishwasher-safe Boroclass glass jar.
feature_bullets: Oster(r) all-metal drive system for lasting durability and performance
Thermal shock jar tested to withstand extreme temperature changes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
